channel.title: Please help its an error i get when i run my server
channel.description:
Hey guys, my server was running fine but when i added ::duel in commands, compiled, got no error then i ran server got no error but the players couldnt log on including me, and now i removed the command ::duel and now i get this so everytime players log in it gives them a back screen and disconnects them. Please help thanks! :)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2055) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:552) at server.main(server.java:111)
Sorry i dont know how to make the code in one of those boxes :S

item.title: Please help its an error i get when i run my server
item.dc:creator: @flaming3330 flaming3330
item.description:
@flaming3330 wrote:

wtf it actually worked LOL tyvm dude i thought my server came to an end cuz no1 was replying woooooot i love you@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@!!! :D:D:D

item.source: Please help its an error i get when i run my server

item.title: Please help its an error i get when i run my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You can only have 15 drops per NPC. You can raise the number in NPCHandler or you can remove a drop.

NPCHandler class:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][[b]45[/b]];

45 - This number devided by 3 is the amount of drops you can have per NPC

Read full topic
item.source: Please help its an error i get when i run my server
